ygData.subject: RE: Help I look like a Nazi
ygData.msgSnippet: Err... No. Hoods are both more expensive and much harder to get. They may be *faster* to get, but much harder. Turbins ran for about 400 plat on Cazic a week
ygData.messageBody:
Err... No. Hoods are both more expensive and much harder to get. They may
be *faster* to get, but much harder. Turbins ran for about 400 plat on Cazic
a week ago and I *think* hoods were around the 800 mark.

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)

8)Never seen him. I
8)would imagine that it's considerably easier/cheaper to get/buy an
